ReleaseInfo.Name: HomeGenie
ReleaseInfo.ReleaseNote: - Added Eden Sensor Board programs to Raspberry Pi section (http://homegenie.it/docs/diy/eden.php) - Improved Program Editor UI - Updated Python and Ruby engines to latest IronLanguages release - Fixed bug in Z-Wave discovery (issue #12) - Added user definable API commands to Wizard script editor (issue #28) - Added remote node prefix to domain of remotely Interconnected modules (issue #26) - Added last updated time info to sensor widget - Updated Jint Javascript Engine (r353-4) - now accepting hg.Program.Setup and other methods using Action delegates - Updated RaspberrySharp-IO - Fixed occasional bug in reading temperature value from HSM-100 sensor
